channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Rename wp-login.php
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Rename wp-login.php

item.title: CVE-2022-1732|2024-08-03T00:16:59.695Z -- unknown -- rename%20wp-login.php
item.description: The Rename wp-login.php WordPress plugin through 2.6.0 does not have CSRF check in place when updating the secret login URL, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack
